name: Tibialis Raise (Wall Lean)
setup: Stand with back against wall, heels 6–12 inches forward
Legs straight but not locked, core lightly braced
Feet flat, weight mostly through heels
steps: Dorsiflex ankles lifting toes toward shins (keep heels down)
Pause briefly at top (1s) feeling anterior shin contract
Lower toes under control to just above floor (no slam)
safety: If anterior shin cramps, reduce reps or ROM; build gradually.

prescriptionHints.notes: Gentle burn okay; stop if sharp tendon pain.

joints.notes: Keep motion at ankle; avoid knee flex compensation.
